p: This allows attention to focus on technical obstacles, such as those related to delivery mechanisms ( Davidson et al., 2012) and unwanted environmental side-effects ( Robock, 2008). In turn, this bolsters the case for an accelerated science and engineering research program in a way that sidelines political issues and risks. With modeling of the climate often assuming a singular global actor, particularly risks related to the international problem disappear further out of view. They do not disappear completely, however, and it is to the ways in which international security figures in the imaginary that we now turn.
